sqlMap.select:
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.WRK_DT),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRK_DT , T1.DPT_CD , T3.DPT_NM , T1.CNB ,T2.USR_NAM ,T1.BZT_ICLS_WRK_YN ,T1.BZT_EXMP_WRK_YN ,F_CODE_NM('1000824',T1.EXS_WRK_RSN_CD) AS EXS_WRK_RSN_NM
,T2.RAL_BLT_DIV_CD,NVL(T2.INN_RANK_CD,'50') AS INN_RANK_CD ,T2.RANK_SRT_SEQ_NM ,T2.CRNT_RANK_APM_DT ,SRT_KY_NO, CRNT_DPT_APM_DT, EIN FROM TBDCMACM039M T1 ,TBDCMACM001M T2 ,TBDCMACM002M T3 WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR(T1.WRK_DT,1,6) = #strMM# AND T1.CNB = #strCNB# AND T1.CNB = T2.CNB AND T1.DPT_CD = T3.DPT_CD
